<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sticky Poison](/Feats.aspx?ID=5781) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=812" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 66 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetypes** [Poisoner](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=71) (Level 8), [Poisoner](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=259) (Level 8)

</column>

---

A combination of additional viscosity and careful application keeps your weapons poisoned even when suffering significant wear and tear. If your Strike with a poisoned weapon would expend its poison without your target attempting an initial save (due to [resistance](/Rules.aspx?ID=2318) or your Strike being a critical failure, for example), attempt a DC 5 [flat check](/Rules.aspx?ID=333). On a success, your weapon remains poisoned. If your Strike with a poisoned weapon succeeds, attempt a DC 17 flat check. On a success, your weapon remains poisoned until the end of your next turn.
name: Sticky Poison
